column1: Smoque BBQ////Service is terrific! If I lived near the area
column2: I'd be a daily diner. After trying multiple items on their menu (the owner let me have a sampler)
column3: I'd say that EVERYTHING is worth getting
column4: but my favorite is brisket. The owner found out that I liked spicy things
column5: so he added some candied jalepenos to my plate. YUM!
